sentences.sContent: “The goal should be to make the villages livable, ” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The goal should be to make the villages livable, ” he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说，“这个目标应该是使村庄适宜居住。

sentences.sContent: In many neighborhoods, someone forgot to plan for that basic building block of livable cities, the sidewalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: In many neighborhoods, someone forgot to plan for that basic building block of livable cities, the sidewalk.
sentences.sCn: 在许多社区，有人竟然忘记为这些适宜居住的城市修建基础设施——人行道。

synos.tran: 适于居住的；生活过得有价值的

words.tran: 活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的

trans.tranOther: (of a room, house, etc) suitable for living in
